title: Squared Sans Serif
content:
I'm looking for this font or something that's very similar without the distressing.

Thanks!

Font: 

 Octin College 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155945/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2013-08-13 at 7.18.22 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155945/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-08-13%20at%207.18.22%20PM.png) | 46.72 KB |
author: c2dawut

comments.content:
IronOn comes close, though I think there is a Letraset font that is closer (though I can't remember its name at the moment).

Octin College and Octin Vintage (distressed) are also very close.

Thanks for the great recommendations kthomps5!

Anyone else?

Confirming kthomps5 suggestion for Octin College. That looks definitely to it, /S is the earmark.  
And now, as requested, a big bunch of alternatives: [United Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155945/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/unitedcollection), [Hoboken Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155945/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Headline+Fonts/Hoboken+High/Sans+Serif/), [Liberator](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155945/http:/www.losttype.com/font/?name=liberator), [Haymaker](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155945/http:/www.losttype.com/font/?name=haymaker) (Tuscan median spurred), [Pop Warner](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155945/http:/www.dafont.com/pop-warner.font), [Jefferies Jaynz](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155945/http:/www.dafont.com/jefferies-jaynz.font), [Bou College](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155945/http:/www.dafont.com/bou-college.font), [Jefferies](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155945/http:/www.dafont.com/jefferies-jaynz.font), [Amarillo USAF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155945/http:/www.dafont.com/amarillo-usaf.font), [High School USA Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155945/http:/www.ffonts.net/High-School-USA-Sans.font), [LHF Old Block](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155945/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/oldblock.php), [Skin & Bones](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155945/http:/www.dafont.com/skin-bones.font) (distressed), [Vincent](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155945/http:/www.pixelpixelpixel.com/2013/01/vincent-typeface), [Vehicle](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155945/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/vehicle), [Directory Board](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155945/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/directory-board), [Abolition](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155945/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hold-fast-foundry/abolition), [Prohibition](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155945/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hold-fast-foundry/prohibition)
